sourcesContent:
import { FormText, Container, Row, Image, Col, Card, Button, Form, InputGroup, FormControl } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { MdEmail, MdLock } from 'react-icons/md';
import { RiFacebookCircleLine, RiGoogleLine } from 'react-icons/ri'
import { FaUserAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'
import { withFormik } from 'formik';
import React from 'react'
import axios from 'axios';
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'

class Login extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        console.log(props)
    }

    render() {
        const {
            status_login,
            values,
            touched,
            errors,
            handleChange,
            handleBlur,
            handleSubmit,
        } = this.props;
        return (
            <Container fluid className='h-100 p-0 d-flex login_background'>
                <Row className='m-auto'>
                    <Col className=' img_login p-0'>
                        <Image className='w-100  ' src="https://colorlib.com/etc/lf/Login_v18/images/bg-01.jpg" rounded></Image>
                    </Col>
                    <Col lg={6} className='p-0'>
                        <Card className='h-100 d-flex flex-row align-self-center'>
                            <Card.Body className='m-auto'>
                                <Card.Text className='text-center h4'>Đăng nhập</Card.Text>
                                <Card.Subtitle className="mb-2 text-muted text-center ">Welcome back, Vui lòng đăng nhập đến tài khoản của bạn</Card.Subtitle>
                                <Form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className='w-75 m-auto form_login'>
                                    {status_login === String(true) ?
                                        <Form.Group controlId="formBasicUserName">
                                            <InputGroup className="mb-2">
                                                <InputGroup.Prepend>
                                                    <InputGroup.Text><FaUserAlt></FaUserAlt></InputGroup.Text>
                                                </InputGroup.Prepend>
                                                <FormControl autoFocus onChange={handleChange} type='text' name='username' placeholder="Username" />
                                            </InputGroup>
                                        </Form.Group> : ""}


                                    <Form.Group controlId="formBasicEmail">
                                        <InputGroup className="mb-2">
                                            <InputGroup.Prepend>
                                                <InputGroup.Text><MdEmail></MdEmail></InputGroup.Text>
                                            </InputGroup.Prepend>
                                            <FormControl onChange={handleChange} type='email' name='email' placeholder="Email" />
                                        </InputGroup>
                                    </Form.Group>

                                    <Form.Group controlId="formBasicPassword">
                                        <InputGroup className="mb-2">
                                            <InputGroup.Prepend>
                                                <InputGroup.Text><MdLock></MdLock></InputGroup.Text>
                                            </InputGroup.Prepend>
                                            <FormControl onChange={handleChange} type='password' name="password" placeholder="Password" />
                                        </InputGroup>
                                    </Form.Group >
                                    <Button className='text-right float-right active' variant="link">Lấy lại mật khẩu</Button>
                                    <Col className='d-flex flex-row justify-content-between mt-3'>

                                        <Button className='' variant="outline-secondary" type="button">
                                            Đăng kí </Button>
                                        <Button className='' variant="secondary" type="submit">
                                            Đăng nhập </Button>
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xs={12} className='mt-3 border-top'>
                                        <Card.Subtitle className='pt-3 text-center'>Bạn có thể đăng nhập bằng</Card.Subtitle>
                                        <Row className=' m-auto pt-3' style={{ width: 'fit-content' }}>
                                            <RiFacebookCircleLine size={30}></RiFacebookCircleLine>
                                            <RiGoogleLine size={30}></RiGoogleLine>
                                        </Row>
                                    </Col>
                                </Form>
                            </Card.Body>
                        </Card>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
            </Container>
        )
    }
}
const FormFormik = withFormik({
    mapPropsToValues: () => ({
        username: '',
        email: '',
        password: '',
        
    }),
    handleSubmit: (values, { setSubmitting }) => {
        alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2));
        setSubmitting(false);
    },
})(Login)

export default FormFormik;
